column5: Hi everyone,  I was on my way to the fall last weekend and had to make a detour because Hamilton skybridge was closed. While I was driving under the bridge, I saw few people fishing by the docks.  It did look nice place for shore fishing as it was open water to Lake Ontario.  What I want to know is what can I catch from under the skybridge this time of the year?  I might drop by this weekend if I get a chance.  Thanks.
I think you meant the Hamilton Skyway?  I know in the latter fall months you can tie into salmon, trout etc...
yea , on the hamilton bay side, just off eastport drive. its like world renowned carp waters..  there was a huge article in one of my OOD mags
